title: How can travel companies reach the new wave of tech-savvy and conscious travelers?
excerpt: The travel industry is undergoing a transformative shift due to recent global events, presenting opportunities for adaptable companies to thrive in this changing digital landscape.

title: Check-in to the Future of Travel With Secured Private Data and Shrunk Queues
excerpt: How we can streamline the data verification, increase security and speed of the processes when traveling.

excerpt: At a time when technological advances are reshaping industries, the travel industry finds itself at a crossroads.

excerpt: Find out why crypto wallets are beneficial for the travel industry, even if customers aren't embracing web3 technologies (yet)

title: NFTs aren’t just digital monkeys. Here’s what they can do for travel.
excerpt: How the travel industry can leverage tokenization of digital assets.

title: A Layer 1 blockchain for the travel industry - Why (not)?
excerpt: We are going to get a bit more technical again and explain why the travel industry needs its own so-called Layer 1 blockchain.

title: Camino 101: What you should know about Camino Network
excerpt: So far, we have been talking a lot about the basics of blockchains and web3. Today we want to share more insights about Camino, the web3 ecosystem for the travel industry.

title: Decentralization in Travel - Are we in the midst of a paradigm shift?
excerpt: Is decentralized travel the future? Decentralization could disrupt the travel industry as we know it. Learn how to leverage it to your advantage.

title: The Emergence of Web 3.0 in Travel
excerpt: The travel industry has been affected by the emergence and continued development of the internet. What Web 3.0 will mean for travel.
